backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI update requirements for team member name changes and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend components, pages, and configs.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for light and dark themes, including brand colors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint with root div and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with main routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/contact/BranchCo: Renders a branch contact card with map embed, address, phone, hours, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/EcoFriendly: Displays eco‑friendly pest control information with icons and an image.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedSer: Shows first three services as cards with a button linking to the full services page.
Auto‑advancing hero slider with images, text overlays, navigation arrows, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/OurTeamSect: Team section that renders member cards using shared teamMembers data.
frontend/src/components/home/ServiceLoca: Renders a grid of service location cards with images and icons for various property types. Uses a predefined list of locations to generate the UI.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseUs: Displays a two-column section with an image and a list of reasons highlighting company strengths. Maps over a reasons array to render icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Builds a footer with company info, quick links, branch details, and social icons using site configuration data. Includes dynamic year and contact links.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle. Highlights active routes using router state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet. Wraps the entire page structure.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays an individual service card with image, title, description, and a link to the service detail page. Uses service data and a styled button.
frontend/src/config/services.ts: Exports the Service interface and a list of detailed service definitions including descriptions, benefits, processes, and images.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Contains global site configuration including name, social links, and branch address/phone details. Used across layout components.
frontend/src/config/team.ts: Defines the TeamMember interface and exports a list of team member profiles with names, roles, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication identity. Recreates and invalidates related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module indicating no backend queries are needed for the static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, and brand color utilities for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company background details and key statistics.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and branch cards, setting the page title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage layout including hero slider, services, team, eco-friendly info, and benefits sections.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a selected service, including images, benefits, process steps, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesListPage.tsx: Lists all available pest control services using ServiceCard components and sets the page title on mount.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and utilities, with plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and a pending request to update Our Team member names across the site.
